discussion.content: Last one should be "Upload the language file”

questions.question_text:
You are a marketer for Contoso Ltd. You plan to create a survey asking how much people like Contoso's products.
You need to ask a series of single answer questions and have a rating scale for the answers, so the respondent can select a value from the scale to answer each question,
Which type of question should you add to your survey?

discussion.content: If your survey has less than 5,000 responses, the responses are exported to an Excel (.xlsx) file by default. If your survey has more than 5,000 responses, you can choose to export the responses to an Excel file or a CSV file.

comments.content: Correct. I have verified in my own environment. However .xlsx is not an option, so would probably choose .csv then

questions.question_text:
You are the marketing manager at Contoso, Ltd. Your team has created a survey and sent it out through email for responses.
You would like to export the responses for further analysis.
Which export file format should be used to complete this task?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
I think D is correct, and what do you think?

comments.content:
It depends if you want to export all responses:

If there are more than 5,000 responses, you can choose to export responses to an Excel (.xlsx) file or a CSV file. If you choose to export responses to the Excel file, only the most recent 5,000 responses are exported. To export all responses, you must choose to export responses to the CSV file.

discussion.content: 5,000+ responses you must choose to export responses to the CVS file: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-voice/survey-report#survey-with-more-than-5000-responses

questions.question_text:
You are a marketing analyst at Contoso Ltd.
The marketing department would like you to provide survey responses from their Customer Success Survey from this past fiscal year. Approximately 6,500 responses were received.
They would like each survey to be a single row, with the responses as a column for their analysis.
What should you do?

choices.C: Use Advanced Find to query the CDS. Set the ג€Look Forג€ to Dynamics 365 Customer Voice survey questions responses. Export to Excel.
choices.D: Open the project in Dynamics 365 Customer Voice. Select the survey in the reports section, and select export all. The responses are downloaded in a CSV File.
choices.B: Use Advanced Find to query the CDS. Set the ג€Look Forג€ to Dynamics 365 Customer Voice survey responses. Export to Excel.
choices.A: Open the project in Dynamics 365 Customer Voice. Select the survey in the reports section, and select export all. The responses are downloaded in an Excel File.
